transcript_chunks.text: i got to play the evil dead game early and i'll talk about in the next episode of gamescast but in the meantime here's me and bruce campbell bickering like an old married couple player with the least kills owes me twenty dollars i know you didn't hear that in the little disclaimer but it's part of your non-disclosure agreement bruce why don't you go pick up the controller over there for andy play a little show us your skills uh you know guys this game would be over so fast you'd all be crying and sucking your thumbs greg you're dana no i'm kelly you're sorry kelly that's right well the actress is dana dealer oh i'm sorry i get fact-checked in the middle yeah come on now get out of our heads don't watch i said don't listen to him i said don't listen to him everybody don't listen how could you expect to win without an ash character i don't i don't understand you say he's the weakest part of the franchise wow wow well i guess our session is over thanks
